desc.cn: JReleaser是 Java 和非 Java 项目（Rust，Elixir，C#等）的发布自动化工具
desc.en: JReleaser is a release automation tool for Java and non-Java projects (Rust, Elixir, C#, etc)

darwin/port.cmd: sudo port selfupdate && sudo port install jreleaser

/curl.cmd: curl -sL https://git.io/get-jreleaser > get_jreleaser.java && chmod +x dtcw && ./dtcw install doctoolchain
